title: 114_hr5305
content: Ste. Genevieve National Historic Site Establishment Act of 2016 This bill establishes the Ste. Genevieve National Historic Site in Missouri as a unit of the National Park System. Interior may acquire, by donation, purchase, or exchange, any land or interest in land located within the boundary of the Historic Site or any nationally significant property identified in the special resource study that is within the Ste. Genevieve Historic District National Historic Landmark.
